title: Oklahoma PragerU Exam for Out-of-State Teachers

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Oklahoma Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. A copy of the exam for teacher applicants produced in connection with PragerU, as referenced in this report from the Associated Press: https://www.news9.com/story/68a492cb408018bdce907d9f/oklahoma-will-test-teachers-from-new-york-and-california-to-guard-against-radical-leftist-ideology-.

2. Any COMMUNICATIONS sent to or from Ryan Walters since January 1, 2025 which mention the words "Prager" or "PragerU" or which were sent to or from an email address on the prageru.com domain.

3. Any COMMUNICATIONS to or from Prager University concerning the exam for teacher applicants identified in (1).

"COMMUNICATIONS" means and includes emails, text messages, social media messages, letters, memoranda, calendar entries, chats, or any form of one-to-one or one-to-many communication.

Please note that this request seeks public records wherever they may be found, including on devices or networks owned or operated by private parties. For example, if an employee uses a personal cell phone or social media account to conduct public business, records created, maintained, or held on the phone or account are public records subject to this request.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh

title: Public Records Request — Courtney Clenney / Christian Obumseli Homicide (Miami Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Pursuant to Florida’s Public Records Law (Chapter 119, Florida Statutes), I request access to the following records relating to the homicide of Christian Obumseli by Courtney Clenney on April 3, 2022, at the One Paraiso Apartments, Miami, Florida:

- All body-worn camera footage from responding officers.
- Any dashcam or in-car camera recordings.
- All 911 call recordings associated with this incident.
- CAD dispatch logs and radio communications.
- Any interview room or interrogation recordings (audio/video) of Courtney Clenney or witnesses.
- Complete incident and investigative reports, including supplemental reports.
- Any crime scene evidence photos or videos generated in this case.

If any portion of these records is exempt from disclosure, please release all reasonably segregable portions and provide statutory justification for redactions or denials.

This request is made for journalistic/documentary purposes and is in the public interest.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

James Shaw

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Public Records Request - Marion County 3
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to video footage from a police intervention, specifically from the body camera worn by the officer(s) and the dashcam of the police vehicles involved. Article:
https://www.wcjb.com/2025/06/14/woman-was-arrested-after-returning-property-she-was-previously-been-given-warning/

Exact date of incident: Jun 11, 2025
Names of parties involved: Kesharra Thomas

I intend to use this footage solely for educational purposes to promote a better understanding of law enforcement procedures and the application of the law.

I understand that there may be associated costs for providing this footage, and I am more than willing to cover any fees incurred. Please inform me about the necessary procedures and the costs involved.

Thank you in advance for your assistance. I trust that this footage will be invaluable for my educational efforts, and I greatly appreciate your cooperation.


Best regards,
George Smith

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

George Smith
